[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]


+ Person of Interest File #████/17 - "DREADMAN"

**Reason for interest:**  The subject, known colloquially as DREADMAN, is described according to the Foundation's database, as a subject of interest, due to the possession of valuable information on different anomalies, as well as encrypted and vital information about the events that occurred on ██/██/████. 
These events tentatively led to a Restructuring Scenario, giving rise to an alternate dimensional line, the existence of which is directly derived from a catastrophic failure in Procedure 220-Calabassas.
For greater ease in terms of identification of events and events, the research project of this alternate dimensional line has been designated under the codename: **Outbreak**

[[image https://thumbs.gfycat.com/CriminalSpanishAmphiuma-size_restricted.gif]]

=====

+ My most recent artwork!

+ Nepobaby

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfsw04x-e2777fa6-8099-4e21-b1de-3ef2f442f781.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1707,q_80,strp/nepobaby_by_dr3adm4n_dfsw04x-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..SPWeWBYlK11tWD0tRj_EwIn7V9xM6xg8C_9assmM7vs]]

> +++ If there is something that Dr. Getsemani hates with fervor, it is favoritism, it does not matter if you are the daughter of a pampered star of the Foundation, you will end up in a cage if your efficiency is not as expected.

"It's nothing personal, Francis, you'll thank me later, we have to turn this little insect into something more useful for this decadent foundation, these are times of crisis, the study of every "SCPecimen", as well as its optimal use are vital for survival."

-----

+ "SCP: Outbreak"
> +++ SCP Outbreak is a headcanon project made in conjunction with [[*user Malebeja]] , however, we hope to be able to make it an official part of SCP one day.

+ Welcome and enjoy the art!!

[[tabview]]
[[tab Ilustrations of SCP Objects]]

+ Ilustrations of SCP Objects

> +++ What is the SCP Foundation without its most famous anomalies? enjoy some representations of our most popular prisoners!"

[[/tab]] 


[[tab Main Researchers]]

+ Main researchers
> +++ "Nerds, lab mice, science guys, no matter what you call them, we all agree they're cool!" Here you will find information about the main researchers within this timeline!"

+ Investigation Team I

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfeqog4-8ab917de-3933-46ef-b52a-a50833d77a5a.png/v1/fill/w_1144,h_699,q_70,strp/scp_outbreak___investigation_team_i_by_dr3adm4n_dfeqog4-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..dJabkPhs24HisdrMC2kGSmKOXg1jVbyQMnVAZ4Zbycw]]

[[collapsible show=" +Director Alto Clef " hide=" -Director Alto Clef "]]

+ Director Alto Clef

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfialyn-a6b29485-1254-4eeb-a4c6-f3d8a5c77400.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..IbZYPbK_Mc52GKpQ5mQHLfAYUkfxOf9ESzPzv31UHSQ]]


[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfehiff-c42c0d85-0158-4180-b287-7ae627d652a9.png/v1/fill/w_923,h_866,q_70,strp/dr__alto_clef_by_dr3adm4n_dfehiff-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..kHDOtV8_hdAj1-N4zNnbDebSyqPdZ9OoDaiF3qEkq20]]

> +++ "Age spares no one, not even the Foundation's favorite cowboy."

After disappearing for 15 years, things at Site-19 are not even a shadow of what they were.
Clef is a man tormented by war and the self-destructive thoughts that swirl in his mind.
After succumbing to the dooming guilt of killing **SCP-239**, Clef seeks a new opportunity at the Foundation, however, things will never be the same again.

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show=" +Researcher Neytari Aegif " hide=" -Resercher Neytari Aegif "]]

+ Junior Researcher: Neytari Aegif


[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfialyk-108eda0c-ea0a-4747-974d-161845a06faf.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..abX2kHE1EywjnEZN8W1vu1uCLsH-Q_E7loOCxiUl1HU]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfd73ek-0ec462b8-356a-49e4-81fc-4ca8d75207d1.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1685,q_80,strp/neytari_aegif___scp_original_character_by_dr3adm4n_dfd73ek-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..5JAG6mpy1w9TOf6r4TmtalV_FI34xj0gtoa9IEZ5hZM]]

> +++ "Don't let her goofy and clumsy appearance fool you... she's even dumber and clumsier than she looks"

Part of the new young talents of the foundation, and being under the tutelage of Dr. Montana, Aegif, is the perfect example of the rookie girl in the Foundation, enthusiastic, optimistic, excited to learn all the secrets that our anomalous universe keeps.

Despite all her initiative and enthusiasm, she has quite a long way to go, which will teach her the necessary knowledge to survive: life within the Foundation is not exactly a fairy tale

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show=" +Researcher Nelliel Shaddix " hide=" -Researcher Nelliel Shaddix" ]]

+ Junior Researcher: Nelliel Shaddix


[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfialyk-108eda0c-ea0a-4747-974d-161845a06faf.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..abX2kHE1EywjnEZN8W1vu1uCLsH-Q_E7loOCxiUl1HU]]


[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfcvg0c-92ab989d-757f-45e2-9c38-bd0a8120f1ae.png/v1/fill/w_772,h_1036,q_70,strp/nelliel_shaddix___scp_original_character_by_dr3adm4n_dfcvg0c-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..iBrbg9C5BkTjb8-sNQT3gshHXnNrUYRnQPJiw12_TYw]]
 
> +++ "With significant achievements in her research work and unprecedented academic performance, she is the example that Director Getsemani's strict discipline pays off"

Nelliel, or "Nelly", was raised by Director Getsemani from an early age, when she was recovered from an MTF operation against a Chaos Insurgency outpost.

Since then, Nelly's abnormal abilities have been manifesting, she can enter a state of intense euphoria that amplifies her abilities and senses as long as she loses a certain amount of blood. Because this ability is a double-edged sword, she always carries a transfusion unit with her to avoid dying of a blood decompensation.

It is theorized that his abnormal abilities may be due to experiments by the Chaos Insurgency itself.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show=" +Researcher Milan Puchetta " hide=" -Researcher Milan Puchetta" ]]

+ Dr. Milan Puchetta

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfiamy5-9501989a-1e1b-4b93-8e5b-1cb272189fca.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_421,q_80,strp/962_sin_ttulo_20221119010600_by_dr3adm4n_dfiamy5-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.._x2cKNPvQfhGeBgVL83KgdzQ2HiIGmIVC1r5EJGz3yU]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfplwbe-bee87f35-1555-4ea9-aa89-c4a81911e7b5.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1685,q_80,strp/milan_puchetta___scp_original_character_by_dr3adm4n_dfplwbe-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..wwj1c3bEOR3T3X9dkDf5S71s-BaEpQk6jpHaYymj5OI]]

> +++ "Beyond her adorable appearance, this star researcher and assistant to Dr. Landman is a scientific element committed to her work, a serious person, with a strong character and with little patience if necessary to resort to violence.
> +++ Even so, she is a glamorous diva who commands respect."

As is to be expected from Dr. Landman's students, Milan is a serious and disciplined researcher, althougt a bit rebellious and not always a follower of the Foundation's ethical principles, she is a scientific element that always does its job, not in the most conventional way, but it does.

She may seem like a vain diva, but she's he has no problem getting blood on his hands if necessary.

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show=" +Director Getsemani Stolze " hide=" -Director Getsemani Stolze "]]


+ Director Getsemani Stolze

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfialyn-a6b29485-1254-4eeb-a4c6-f3d8a5c77400.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..IbZYPbK_Mc52GKpQ5mQHLfAYUkfxOf9ESzPzv31UHSQ]]


[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfcnq5o-231d5ca4-b278-49a4-a486-8acd1c0448fc.png/v1/fill/w_779,h_1026,q_70,strp/getsemani_stolze___scp_original_character_by_dr3adm4n_dfcnq5o-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..eGDPBlAFWkDka8S1L1XqTz89ZNxs72xReTuwrGV0C6Q]]

> +++ "The Headquarters Director Getsemani Stolze is a woman of facts, and few words: you betray the system, and die, simple as that"

Previously a prominent element, and commander of MTF Omicron-9 (Janissaries), Getsemani always demonstrated unwavering loyalty to the Foundation, with leadership, discipline, and plenty of sacrifice.

It was then until the events related to the Great Restructuring Event, that, after Clef's disappearance, Getsemani was chosen by the regional administrator to serve as Director, making great changes in the organization.

Currently, he has several anomalous youth elements under his wing.

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show=" +Dr. Johnatan Montana " hide=" -Dr. Johnatan Montana "]]

+ Dr. Johnatan Montana

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfialyn-a6b29485-1254-4eeb-a4c6-f3d8a5c77400.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..IbZYPbK_Mc52GKpQ5mQHLfAYUkfxOf9ESzPzv31UHSQ]]


[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfd2pen-ae8fcc7c-0a63-4c8d-a135-27e9fb40a262.png/v1/fill/w_779,h_1026,q_70,strp/johnatan_montana___scp_original_character_by_dr3adm4n_dfd2pen-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..ZS1hJA-rkL7pp_dawBklV8PdVeLtiALdSklmsA0pGAw]]

> +++ "The enigmatic man from the newspaper. You better watch what you do, every move you make could be recorded."

With decades of service to the Foundation, Doctor Montana can best be described as strict man, but one you can trust. With little Aegif in his care, he is a skilled, capable, and quite experienced item in the field of anomaly research.

To date it is not known if the newspaper, or itself, is dealing with an anomaly: it is capable of reading events and occurrences close to its location as long as they have been close to the newspaper, manifesting these events in the images, or the the text of the paper itself.

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show=" +Dr. Balthazar Van de Merwe " hide=" -Dr. Balthazar Van de Merwe "]]

+ Director Balthazar Van de Merwe

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfialyn-a6b29485-1254-4eeb-a4c6-f3d8a5c77400.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..IbZYPbK_Mc52GKpQ5mQHLfAYUkfxOf9ESzPzv31UHSQ]]


[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfemftr-996385d2-5b67-4b6e-a9aa-e89e206e320a.png/v1/fill/w_779,h_1026,q_70,strp/balthazar_van_de_merwe___original_scp_character_by_dr3adm4n_dfemftr-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..CuWCTTJFkM1xOesCDnJ7qofCDWxzR8nkinIgD0KOkIU]]

> +++ "Mysterious, enigmatic, sinister, but elegant at all times"

Dr. Van de Merwe avoids unnecessary talk and focuses solely on action and results.
So little is known about him, that he is even an enigma to his companions, since his biokinetic abilities reminiscent of Sarkicism, as well as his privileged mind, show superiority in combat, both human against human, as well as human against anomaly.

There are rumors that it was found in a basalt ███████████ in northern ███████.

[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Class-D Personnel]]

+ Class-D Personnel
> +++ "Oh yeah, the bad boys, the rebels, the bad boys wears orange. Remember that!"


[[collapsible show=" +Damari Pacific" hide=" -Damari Pacific " ]]

+ Damari Pacific
 
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfiamyt-0bacbfd9-585c-4162-b729-a2aa8b53393c.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..vnwO_X7fWS9nFWUwHFWRLjrOBB8rM1jDdvjEJy8Xr38]]

[[Image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfdd7d3-15b6833c-c76e-4450-805a-da777824eb6c.png/v1/fill/w_779,h_1026,q_70,strp/class_d_scp_oc___damari_pacific_by_dr3adm4n_dfdd7d3-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Dg11kTNqoIxAZG0DkjJEPf4NXrAnOKaNHkAw09Ef0rM]]

+++ Cunning, intelligent, suspicious and a bit perverted, Damari is what you would expect from an American girl from the slums.

Originally it was an academically exemplary girl, although from a low economic class.
However, with an obsession to leave her "weak nerd" character behind, and get ahead, Damari discovered the pleasure of rebellion in her adolescence, committing small robberies in the suburbs in order to survive.

It was then during a robbery using a borrowed gun, he showed courage, but he didn't have enough to pull the trigger, and his weakness was paid for with the arrest.

It is then that, far from ending up in a local penitentiary, he wears the orange uniform of Class-D from now on.
[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Lore (WIP) ]]

[[collapsible show=" +Significant Changes " hide=" -Significant Changes" ]]
+ Significant Changes
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dferv7m-d5c7e593-fc64-4859-921e-016628d7cd36.png/v1/fill/w_1182,h_676,q_70,strp/scp_outbreak___clef_1_by_dr3adm4n_dferv7m-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..dg9qvfshemOr3pnf7KX9_EMiq3JZAj-KA8k2Mj72NRA]]

> +++ "Time will catch up with you sooner or later, right Francis?... bah, bullshit, there's still plenty of action left in these heroic old bones!"

Still... do you remember those glory days? Hated by many, loved by a few, but ignored by no one... And that was the important thing... you were the idiot who attracted attention, today look at you, neither you, nor this world, are the shadow of what they were"

-As the man walked through the wooded paths of a forest in the autumn season, strumming the strings of his ukulele, looking at a canyon in front of him, it seemed as if reality itself suffered a glitch-

The world is no longer what it was, Francis, even so, your music continues to play... <

+ Sorrow

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfiah5x-2dc38ecc-3a47-48e0-ade3-f4e2d6fc1269.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1856,strp/sorrow_by_dr3adm4n_dfiah5x-fullview.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..4d1nDRlAVHThxVCluo8oHJ1HtDHkL_kP3_-_qn6WSJ0]]

[[tab "The Elegy of The Scarlet King" (Scarlet King Tales) ]]



[[collapsible show=" +The Scarlet Monarch awakens " hide=" 
- The Scarlet Monarch awakens" ]]

> + The Scarlet Monarch awakens
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/df75bgi-0acfe967-df19-454b-8337-33d032e4fa66.png/v1/fill/w_887,h_901,q_70,strp/scarlet_king_by_dr3adm4n_df75bgi-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..xGQ2kDdwkeI-2MM741K6eAKQxcxNA5mWqmY0IPZUySM]]

> +++ "The one called Destruction, which in its wake leaves less than simple ashes of what have been empires of astronomical size."

The Scarlet King, a being so unimaginably powerful, that not even when facing him, humanity would have evolved so much to be able to pronounce the word that describes him.

From his throne in the void, where he rested cataleptic and chained, the dark demonic sultan awoke, observing with omnipotence that universe, which he now reigned supreme.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show=" +Supreme Emperor of Evil  " hide=" 
-Supreme Emperor of Evil" ]]

> + Supreme Emperor of Evil

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfdphes-106ed8fc-f079-41a0-b58d-de5983843740.png/v1/fill/w_779,h_1026,q_70,strp/the_scarlet_king_by_dr3adm4n_dfdphes-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..KDfQmduF_yLCSpod0iwLWvn6op5jXi95JYoMIBI2mjc]]

> +++ "Six Scarlet Eyes, Towards the Horizon of Madness"

Even trying to understand its hypothetical existence is the subject of intense debate for The Foundation, however, when the world was about to be ripped from the depths of the fabric of reality, just a touch of its gargantuan claw was enough to change. the world forever, that's where humanity was close to total disappearance, but they learned a valuable lesson:

It is real.

> "We are blessed to still be alive.
> "We are blessed, because our soul and what makes us human still belongs to us."

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show=" +Horizon  " hide=" 
-Horizon" ]]

> + Horizon

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfk003j-f03f6fc4-7021-4482-a5ce-e9a14ba20713.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1600,q_80,strp/horizon_of_madness_by_dr3adm4n_dfk003j-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..S8fpbMa7fWXbwYotRheD68hMJ6398ibEN5X6p-v8NU4]]

> ++ "The Void"

> The Crimson Khan, lethargic, advanced in the infinity of the vast cosmic void, leaving behind him, sterile microcosms among dead stars, unaware of being the supreme organism on the pyramid of life, he looked into the void, and got no answer, he roared. to the void , and that void looked back at him. Horizon of madness.

> + The Hanged King

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/df7li1a-794b9fbb-085d-4f04-8cd6-d8e09a85232d.png/v1/fill/w_761,h_1050,q_70,strp/the_hanged_king_by_dr3adm4n_df7li1a-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..pJDwDP0XTCVpAmvusSnMMpGZXIMVtQAZzBmqPFQyQzk]]

> +++ "Victim of his own greed, the Hanged King lives suspended on a gallows for eternity, plunged into a stormy and very slow descent into madness and the total doom of his soul"

A crown means nothing, much less when the meaning of royalty disguises a misfortune.

[[collapsible show=" +The King awaits  " hide="

> + The King awaits

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfhiy4h-590c8dfd-f104-4722-bd1f-6bb4d2eb7a6a.png/v1/fill/w_800,h_1000,q_70,strp/the_hanged_king_by_dr3adm4n_dfhiy4h-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..CKwK-NAZb3tIMSvhRFhIJKR8VIYQtLB-8wLMzZM5Fxg]]

> +++ "Tragedy is quite frequent, it exists everywhere, even life itself is a tragic play..."


[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show=" +The Black Lord of Alagadda  " hide=" 
-The Black Lord of Alagadda" ]]

> + The Black Lord, bearer of the anguished mask.

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/df9po93-174d8794-6f2b-414a-963f-a08ad1ecab5a.png/v1/fill/w_758,h_1054,q_70,strp/the_black_lord_of_alagadda_by_dr3adm4n_df9po93-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..5b6tBAzMc_PAs8npDBzg3B5UeyCISVVe28iEbYMa3xo]]

> +++ "A traitor, let's call him what he is"

Of all the lords who serve the hanged sovereign of Alagadda, we can highlight that not all of them are especially loyal to the cause, this is the case of the Black Lord.

Under the guise of yet another servant of the Alagaddian crown, the Black Lord can be described as an informant and spy who gathers political information and reveals Alagadda's military strategies directly to his rival: the Iron Gallows.

His mask torn from his body, and exiled to the underworld at the hands of the White Lord, his existence has now been reduced to being a simple mask in a puddle of black mud inside a glass box.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show=" +The White Lord of Alagadda  " hide=" 
-The White Lord of Alagadda" ]]

> + The White Lord of Alagadda, bearer of the dilligent mask

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfaezqu-37932540-9bf7-4b93-b3a4-dbb6adb42d90.png/v1/fill/w_800,h_1000,q_70,strp/the_white_lord_of_alagadda_by_dr3adm4n_dfaezqu-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..0AMUBlu6vUhCSPh44INS5cZq6EoY-SMMyOSblaNavzg]]

> +++ Any betrayal of the Alagaddian crown, must be punished with severity!!! Loyalty, honor, fight, and blood for the Hanged King!

The White Lord of Alagadda could be described as the direct chancellor of the Hanged King.
He is a diplomatic leader, with vast knowledge of the history of various dimensions, highly apt for military leadership, a war strategist and an incomparable assassin.

He is the one who guides the high command of the Alagaddian crown, as well as the rest of the masked lords.

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfiosgh-1d40c85b-c6c4-4f59-884b-3b5a08287d59.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1600,q_80,strp/dr__wondertainment_by_dr3adm4n_dfiosgh-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..-sfewtWmMA8p02SukAQf85uYz4fHNboh6pCjgwfdCQk]]

> ++ "What is happiness? Is it a glimpse of the childhood essence that we all carry inside?
> "We are not very different from the universe; in constant growth, moreover, very small inside, we continue to be small, no matter how much the world around us expands..."

> Wilbur W. Wondertainment I

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show=" +The Director of Operations " hide=" -The Director of Operations" ]]

> + Kilara W. Vangeli

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfjpjw4-61b5e61c-23b4-49d3-9604-5458777db7ee.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1728,q_80,strp/kilara_vangeli___scp_original_character_by_dr3adm4n_dfjpjw4-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..vxhSwPQsKVzBYteHECyzCRO-_rG7gEoCVmn4qMM0CsI]]


> ++ "A rather dreamy girl, she believes in magic, and at the same time glimpses the future with the illusion of observing the changes that a new world brings".

> "Responsibilities, so complex and difficult, make us extinguish the magical spark that we carry inside, that child full of illusions that refuses to abandon its home in our imagination, it speaks to us, it calls us to search within ourselves for the illusions and creativity that we once had, listen to it, do not let it disappear, go ahead and grow, preserving the magic of our interior allows us to be what we are. We are, unique, a universe in each one of us" 

-Kilara W. Vangeli

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show=" +The Executive Director " hide=" -The Executive Director" ]]

> + Isabel Helga Anastasia Parvati Wondertainment V

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfjebu9-adc12706-c866-43cd-a4e1-e747e488f07b.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1499,q_80,strp/isabel_helga_anastasia_parvati_wondertainment_v_by_dr3adm4n_dfjebu9-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..v_ADhSnhHpO7Xlj_N0wi93rbk8nucl10BvAaOa2lVKo]]


> ++ The clock ticks, the sand falls through the narrow neck of the clock, times change and everything is modernized, even more than it should...

> "However, the emotion, the happiness, the childish illusion will always be the same as long as you never stop dreaming, that is why dreams are better than reality! I think!
> I dream of a world where everything returns to the glory it once was, and you? what is your dream?"
> 
> -Dr. Isabel Helga Anastasia Parvati Wondertainment V
